ticket.title: Why didn't fixes backport to rails.js in rails3.0 stable?
ticket.original-body:
Hi, all.
rails.js in rails3.0 stable has many bugs. For example: https://github.com/rails/prototype-ujs/commit/9d5aa75eee9b39818bddfe5a96737e548b1b538d https://github.com/rails/prototype-ujs/commit/60f352a18e68ec2ed97ae01b2d72cda9dda5a216
And, all fixes already commited to edge. https://github.com/rails/rails/commit/e9a04320d73d554870ea4c3bf7c1ec18bafcb157
Why didn't fixes backport to rails.js in rails3.0 stable?
ticket.latest-body:
Hi, all.
rails.js in rails3.0 stable has many bugs. For example: https://github.com/rails/prototype-ujs/commit/9d5aa75eee9b39818bddfe5a96737e548b1b538d https://github.com/rails/prototype-ujs/commit/60f352a18e68ec2ed97ae01b2d72cda9dda5a216
And, all fixes already commited to edge. https://github.com/rails/rails/commit/e9a04320d73d554870ea4c3bf7c1ec18bafcb157
Why didn't fixes backport to rails.js in rails3.0 stable?
ticket.original-body-html:
Hi, all.

rails.js in rails3.0 stable has many bugs.
For example:
https://github.com/rails/prototype-ujs/commit/9d5aa75eee9b39818bddf...
https://github.com/rails/prototype-ujs/commit/60f352a18e68ec2ed97ae...

And, all fixes already commited to edge.
https://github.com/rails/rails/commit/e9a04320d73d554870ea4c3bf7c1e...

Why didn't fixes backport to rails.js in rails3.0 stable?
